data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Mamoudzou, Mayotte not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mamoudzou, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 6 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Mamoudzou, Mayotte.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 6,099 who are far from you in Mamoudzou, Mayotte from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 6 believers in the state of Mamoudzou with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Mamoudzou, Mayotte.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Mamoudzou, Mayotte that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
